content: Arizona Horizon Health reported an unusual cluster of idiopathic cardiomyopathy cases linked to genetic markers in individuals of Polynesian descent. Patient ID# PX-88723 was admitted on 06/15/2023 for advanced cardiac monitoring. Treatment included a tailored regimen of sacubitril/valsartan and ongoing genetic counseling. Dr. Elena Varga noted the patient's participation in study NCT04567823 exploring familial cardiomyopathy patterns. Address on file: 2301 W. Catalina Dr., Phoenix, AZ 85029.
